Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.entity

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.entity.Entity
it.polimi.ingsw.model.entity.Island
public class Island extends Entity
The island implements the PawnHandler interface, contains the list of students, towers and a boolean variable noEntry dedicated to the expert mode. It also contains references to the previous and next island used by the Game() class. It implements methods related to moving towers and students and calculating the influence of a player.

      public int getIslandSize()
      Returns the size of the island. The size of an island is defined as how many initial islands it consists of.
      Returns:
      the size of the island

    • getTowerColor

      public TowerColor getTowerColor()
      If towers are present on the island, it returns their color. If there are no towers on the island it returns null.
      Returns:
      the color of the towers

    • getInfluencePoints

      public int getInfluencePoints(Player player, EffectHandler effectHandler)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the influence points

    • getInfluencePoints

      public int getInfluencePoints(Team team, EffectHandler effectHandler)
      method for the 4-player mode Returns the getInfluencePoints(professors) method which returns the number of students of the color on which the team has the most influence.
      Parameters:
      team - the team on which to calculate the influence points
      Returns:
      the influence points

    • getInfluencePoints

      private int getInfluencePoints(List<Professor> professors, EffectHandler effectHandler)
      Check the professors of a given team. Count the number of students on the island related to the same color as the professors. Returns the largest number.
      Parameters:
      professors - the professors through which to calculate the influence points
      Returns:
      the influence points

    • getInfluencePlayer

      public Player getInfluencePlayer(List<Player> players, EffectHandler effectHandler)
      Returns the player with the most influence on the island. If there are towers on the island I compare the previous influence points with the new ones and return the dominant player, in case of a tie I keep the current one. If there are no towers on the island, I return the player with the most influence points. If no player has influence on the island return null.
      Returns:
      the player with the most influence on the island, null if no one owns the island

    • getInfluenceTeam

      public Team getInfluenceTeam(List<Team> teams, EffectHandler effectHandler)
      method for the 4-player mode Returns the team with the most influence on the island. If there are towers on the island I compare the previous influence points with the new ones and return the dominant team, in case of a tie I keep the current one. If there are no towers on the island, I return the team with the most influence points. If no team has influence on the island return null
      Returns:
      the team with the most influence on the island

    • moveTowers

      public void moveTowers()
      Move towers from the island to their owner's school.

    • checkUnifyNext

      public boolean checkUnifyNext()
      Check if the current island and the next island can be merged. Check if the two adjacent islands have towers of the same color.
      Returns:
      a boolean that tells if the two islands can be merged

    • checkUnifyPrev

      public boolean checkUnifyPrev()
      Check if the current island and the previous island can be merged. Check if the two adjacent islands have towers of the same color.
      Returns:
      a boolean that tells if the two islands can be merged
